name: Laurent Charlin, Interim Scientific Director of Mila – Quebec Artificial Intelligence Institute, Canada CIFAR AI Chair, and Associate Professor at HEC Montréal
research: Charlin’s research focuses on developing novel machine learning models to aid in decision-making. Recent work has focused on learning from data that changes over time, and on applications in fields such as recommender systems and optimization. He has a number of highly cited publications on dialogue systems (chatbots).
